Module com.example.project3fx
Package com.example.project3fx

Class TuitionManagerController

java.lang.Object
com.example.project3fx.TuitionManagerController
All Implemented Interfaces:
javafx.fxml.Initializable
public class TuitionManagerController extends Object implements javafx.fxml.Initializable
controller class to handle tuition manager GUI and all requests from user
Author:
harsh_patel, giancarlo_andretta

    removeStudent(javafx.event.ActionEvent event)
    this method removes student if student is in roster
    private void
    updateCreditsCompletedAndPrint()
    this method updates total credits of student based on current semester's enrollment
    private void
    updateMajor()
    updatemajor is a method that updates the major of a student in the roster it takes string user input and splits it into an array of strings if the length of the array is 4 and the roster is not empty then the code will do first checks to see if the major code is valid or not if it's not then it will generate an error message then it will look up the students in the roster and update their major then if the student is found in the roster list that person major will be changed once it has been successfully changed a success message will be printed out at the same time if that student wasn't found in the roster then an error message will be printed
    protected void
    updateMajor(javafx.event.ActionEvent event)
    this method updates major if student is in roster and based on user major selection
    protected void
    UpdateSchpAmount(javafx.event.ActionEvent event)
    this method updates scholarship amount to total tuition amount if student is enrolled and is a resident student

      public TuitionManagerController()

  • Method Details

    • checkDetails

      private boolean checkDetails(Student student, String date)
      checkdetails if the student is old enough or not to be enrolled in college and if they have any college credits
      Parameters:
      student - object
      date - dob
      Returns:
      true or false based on above condition

    • checkDetailsAndAdd

      private void checkDetailsAndAdd(Student s, String fname, String lname, String dob, String state, boolean isFromFile)
      this method checks the details of student adds to the roster
      Parameters:
      s - object which is going to be added
      fname - student's first name
      lname - student's last name
      dob - student's date of birth
      state - for tristate students
      isFromFile - if from file is true then no print messages

    • processAndInsert_INTL_STUDENT

      private void processAndInsert_INTL_STUDENT()
      method helps to process international student data and also checks the details of student and adds to the roster

    • processAndInsert_TRI_STATE_STUDENT

      private void processAndInsert_TRI_STATE_STUDENT()
      method helps to process tri state student data and also checks the details of student and adds to the roster

    • processAndInsert_RES_STUDENT

      private void processAndInsert_RES_STUDENT()
      method helps to process Resident student data and also checks the details of student and adds to the roster

    • processAndInsert_NON_RES_STUDENT

      private void processAndInsert_NON_RES_STUDENT()
      method helps to process Non-Resident student data and also checks the details of student and adds to the roster

    • addStudentType_FROMFILE_HELPER

      private void addStudentType_FROMFILE_HELPER(String[] dataArr, String studentType, String fname, String lname, String dob, String major)
      Helper method to add studentType data from file
      Parameters:
      dataArr - student data
      studentType - process and add resident, non-resident, tri-state, International
      fname - student's first name
      lname - student's last name
      dob - student's date of birth
      major - student's major

    • processAndInsert_FROM_FILE

      private void processAndInsert_FROM_FILE()
      method to process and add students from given file

    • checkDetailsOfEnrollStudent

      private int checkDetailsOfEnrollStudent(Student student, int creditsEnrolled)
      method checks the details of enroll student with the help of credits enrolled
      Parameters:
      student - student object
      creditsEnrolled - enrolled credits of student
      Returns:
      -1 if invalid credits, on success returns 0

    • checkAndEnrollStudent

      private void checkAndEnrollStudent(String fname, String lname, String dob, int creditsEnrolled)
      method checks if student is in roster or not and adds to enrollment on success
      Parameters:
      fname - student's first name
      lname - student's last name
      dob - student's date of birth
      creditsEnrolled - student's credit enrolled

    • processAndEnrollStudent

      private void processAndEnrollStudent()
      methods helps to process student data and checks if student is eligible for enrollment or not

    • updateMajor

      private void updateMajor()
      updatemajor is a method that updates the major of a student in the roster it takes string user input and splits it into an array of strings if the length of the array is 4 and the roster is not empty then the code will do first checks to see if the major code is valid or not if it's not then it will generate an error message then it will look up the students in the roster and update their major then if the student is found in the roster list that person major will be changed once it has been successfully changed a success message will be printed out at the same time if that student wasn't found in the roster then an error message will be printed

    • processAndRemove

      private void processAndRemove()
      This method process the input and then remove student from the roster
      Throws:
      NullPointerException - if any of the date is null
      IllegalArgumentException - if the given data does not match the expected format (fname lname dob)

    • printTuitionDue

      private void printTuitionDue()
      this method prints student's tuition based on credits enrolled

    • ApplyScholarship

      private void ApplyScholarship()
      this method process student data and helps to apply scholarship based on student type

      protected void UpdateSchpAmount(javafx.event.ActionEvent event)

      Parameters:
      event - update scholarship amount button event
